sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from 'react' function Hero() { useEffect(()=> { // Change The Hero Highlighted Text Change To Read And Write In Every Inerval let hero_highlight_text = document.getElementById('hero-highlight-text'); let count = 0; setInterval(function() { count++; hero_highlight_text.innerHTML = count % 2 === 0 ? "Read" : "Write"; hero_highlight_text.classList.replace(`${count % 2 === 0 ? "text-green-500" : 'text-blue-500'}`,`${count % 2 === 0 ? "text-blue-500" : 'text-green-500'}`); }, 5000); },[]) return (

) } export default Hero
